Windlord::

"I think that he has amnesia" said Windlord

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer examines his wounds.
> 
> Burning hammer: How come I'm so hurt?
> 
> Perplex: You were beaten pretty bad, that's why.
> 
> Burning Hammer: Ooh, who attacked me?
> 
> Perplex: Burning Hammer?
> 
> Burning Hammer: Cool name, huh? Who are you guys?
> 
> Perplex: What?
> 
> Burning Hammer: Can I use your CR Chamber? You have one, right? You 
have a base, so I thought maybe you might have a CR Chamber.
> 
> Perplex: Huh?
> 
> Burning Hammer: Yeah, someone beat me up pretty bad, I would 
appreciate if you would help me here.
> 
> Perplex: Weren't you?...
